text:
Apple, Inc. | Sr. Frontend Engineer, iTunes Engineering | Cupertino, CA, USA | Full-time | ONSITE, VISA

Join iTunes Digital Supply Chain to come work on internal and external facing web-sites. We work in a team oriented manner with an eye toward site usability and code re-use. The ideal candidate will have great communication skills and come with a passion for iterating on products.

Send resumes to: dsce-job-apply@group.apple.com

https://jobs.apple.com/us/search?#&ss=86380756&t=0&so=&lo=0*...
